data.name: The Mors Demo
data.detailed_description:
You limp down a dark tunnel, blood dripping from your hands as you struggle to hold your light. You try to look at your map, try to remember where you are and where you need to go. You hear a sharp cracking sound behind you, the map falls to the floor as you realize the truth, it has won. You feel something behind you, a cold wind blows past...darkness...

This demo is meant to test your courage and push you to your limits as you navigate your way out of this nightmare. The demo can be played multiple times as every time you play, the game changes.
data.about_the_game:
You limp down a dark tunnel, blood dripping from your hands as you struggle to hold your light. You try to look at your map, try to remember where you are and where you need to go. You hear a sharp cracking sound behind you, the map falls to the floor as you realize the truth, it has won. You feel something behind you, a cold wind blows past...darkness...

This demo is meant to test your courage and push you to your limits as you navigate your way out of this nightmare. The demo can be played multiple times as every time you play, the game changes.
data.short_description: This demo of The Mors will test your courage and push you to your limits as you navigate your way out of this nightmare. Can you find your way out before the darkness closes in?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 32bit or above
  • Processor: Core i3 CPU or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
